document_data.name: Samular Caradoon
document_data.mainbody: '''Samular''' was a [[human]] knight of [[Tyr]] during the 10{{th}} century [[DR]], and the founder of the [[Holy Order of Samular]].
document_data.Relationships: Samular was the youngest of three brothers. The oldest was [[Renwick Caradoon]] who became a [[wizard]] and the middle brother [[Amphail the Just]] became a [[paladin]] as well.
document_data.History: Caradoon founded the Holy Order of Samular after becoming famous for his heroic actions in the [[Trollwars|Second Trollwar]], which ended in [[952 DR]].
